alert.note: Alert for Itasca; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 4:27PM CDT until July 19 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ITASCA AND WESTERN ST. LOUIS COUNTIES... At 426 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Marcell, or 23 miles north of Grand Rapids, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 2.5 inch hail 2 NW of Bowstring. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hibbing, Keewatin, Nashwauk, Buck Lake, Stingy Lake, Kelly Lake, Lawrence Lake, Spider Lake, Gunn Lake, and Balsam Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
